author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ALBERTO APPROACHING THE COAST OF MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINS, COASTAL FLOODING, AND GUSTY WINDS FORECAST TO CONTINUE THROUGH THE MORNING ALONG THE COASTS OF TEXAS AND  NORTHEASTERN MEXICO...
summary:
...ALBERTO APPROACHING THE COAST OF MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINS, COASTAL FLOODING, AND GUSTY WINDS FORECAST TO CONTINUE THROUGH THE MORNING ALONG THE COASTS OF TEXAS AND  NORTHEASTERN MEXICO...
 As of 1:00 AM CDT Thu Jun 20
 the center of Alberto was located near 21.9, -96.1
 with movement W at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 993 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
